title: President Zardari visits Bhutto family graveyard
content:
LARKANA , Jun 21 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Friday visited the graveyard of Bhutto family in Garhi Khuda Bakhsh Bhutto and laid wreaths on the graves of Shaheed Zulfikar Ali Bhutto, Shaheed Benazir Bhutto and others.
President Zardari, who was accompanied by his sister Faryal Talpur, also offered Fatiha for their departed souls and recited verses from the Holy Quran.
The president was in Garhi Khuda Bakhsh Bhutto in connection with the 71st birthday anniversary of Shaheed Benazir Bhutto.
